articles.title: Jeremy Renner Moaning in Pain on Snowplow Accident 911 Call Audio - TMZ
articles.description: Jeremy Renner's moaning in pain in the 911 call audio from his snowplow accident.
articles.content:
Jeremy Renner was moaning in pain in the background of the 911 call from his snowplow accident ... with his neighbor telling the operator he'd been "crushed" by a Snowcat.
In audio of the emergency … [+1437 chars]
